    #include<stdio.h>
    typedef unsigned long long int64;
    int fa[100005],si[100005];
    int main()
    {
    int n,m;
    scanf("%d%d",&n,&m);
    int i;
    for(i=1;i<=n;i++){
    fa[i] =-1;si[i] = 1;
    }
    int x,y;
    for(i=0;i<m;i++)
    {
    scanf("%d%d",&x,&y);
    int fa1,fa2,si1,si2;
    fa1=x; while(fa[fa1]!=-1)fa1=fa[fa1];
    fa2=y; while(fa[fa2]!=-1)fa2=fa[fa2];
    si1=si[fa1];si2=si[fa2];
    if(fa1-fa2)
    {
    if(si1>si2){fa[fa2]=fa1;si[fa1]+=si2;
    }
    else {fa[fa1] = fa2; si[fa2]+=si1;
    }
    }
    }
    int64 total = 0;
    int64 rem = n;
    for(i=0;i<n;i++)
    {
    if(fa[i]==-1)
    {
    int64 cur = si[i];
    rem =rem-cur;
    total+=cur*rem;
    }
    }
     
    printf("%llu\n",total);
     
    }
